TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PackWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you use the pack URI protocol, you can reference a package and its part elements either locally from inside a package or externally from a Web source.
For the pack URI protocol, the forward-slash characters (//) of an embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] are represented by commas (,,). For example: `pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,folder,file.package/images/picture1.jpg` references the file `/images/picture1.jpg` that is contained in `http://www.adatum.com/folder/file.package`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the stream for this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Make certain that objects close when they are no longer in use so that resources are not exhausted.

Docs.summary: Gets the content length of the response.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > Checking this property on an actual Web request and matching response has performance implications because in some circumstances it requires that the whole response stream is read.

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] content type of the response stream's content.
Docs.value: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the stream's content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If a request does not specify a part in the package, it returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the package.
Requests that specify a part in the package return one of the following:
1. If the requested part contains a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value is returned.
2. If the requested part contains no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value but the stream name contains a recognized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] extension type, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type corresponding to the extension is returned.
3. If the requested part does not contain a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value nor a recognized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] extension type, ContentType returns an empty string.

Docs.summary: Gets the response stream that is contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks InnerResponse returns `null` when the response is from the package cache (when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse.IsFromCache%2A> is `true`).

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the response is from the package cache or from a Web request.
Docs.value: if the response is from the package cache; if the response is from a Web request.
